TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventProvider extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 该类可用于写入事件。

span.span: Use this class to write events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用事件使用编写和方法，事件都必须定义清单; 中写入使用事件方法不需要清单。To consume events written using the and methods, the events must be defined in a manifest; events written using the method do not require a manifest. 事件可以包含以下托管的数据类型：Events can contain the following managed data types: - boolbool - BooleanBoolean - bytebyte - charchar - decimaldecimal - doubledouble - floatfloat - GUIDGuid - intint - IntPtrIntPtr - longlong - sbytesbyte - shortshort - 字符串string - uintuint - UInt64UInt64 如果你的清单中的事件使用`Boolean`，类型不能写入数据元素使用`Boolean`托管代码中的数据类型。If an event in your manifest uses the `Boolean` in-type, you cannot write the data element using a `Boolean` data type in your managed code. `Boolean`类型在清单中需要 4 字节值，和一个`Boolean`在托管代码中的数据类型为 1 字节。The `Boolean` in-type in your manifest expects a 4-byte value, and a `Boolean` data type in managed code is 1-byte. 相反，你必须使用`int`写值的数据类型。Instead, you must use an `int` data type to write the value. 如果你想要登录`Boolean`值，请使用 UInt8 类型在清单中。If you want to log a `Boolean` value, use the UInt8 in-type in your manifest.

MemberSignature.Value: public EventProvider (Guid providerGuid);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid providerGuid) cil managed
Public Sub New (providerGuid As Guid)
public: EventProvider(Guid providerGuid);

param.name: providerGuid
param.span: 唯一标识提供程序的 GUID。

span.span: Guid that uniquely identifies the provider.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册提供程序。Registers the provider. 若要删除的注册完成后，调用方法。To remove the registration when finished, call the method.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来完成该操作。

span.span: There is not enough memory to complete the operation.

exception.span: 命名空间中的类仅适用于 Windows Vista。

span.span: The classes in the namespace work only on Windows Vista.
The parameter cannot be null.

exception.span: 由 ETW 子系统返回的错误。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Close ()
public: virtual void Close();

summary.span: 从 ETW 子系统中移除提供程序的注册并释放所有非托管资源。

span.span: Removes the provider's registration from the ETW subsystem and releases all unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你应调用此方法完成而不是等待系统后，若要释放的资源。You should call this method when finished instead of waiting for the system to dispose of the resources.

exception.span: 由 ETW 子系统返回的错误。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

span.span: Creates a unique activity identifier for the provider.

returns.span: 在调用 方法为提供程序设置活动标识符时使用的唯一 GUID。

span.span: A unique Guid that you use when calling the method to set the activity identifier for the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是静态方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 获取与事件写入失败相关联的最后一个错误。

span.span: Gets the last error associated with an event write failure.

returns.span: 该值可用于确定事件写入失败的原因。

span.span: Use the value to determine the cause of an event write failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和方法将此值进行了设置，如果他们未能写入该事件。The , , and methods set this value if they fail to write the event. 这是静态方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 确定该提供程序是否已经由某个会话启用。

span.span: Determines whether a session enabled the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled ();
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled() cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled () As Boolean
public: bool IsEnabled();

summary.span: 确定该提供程序是否已经由某个会话启用，而与用来启用该提供程序的级别值和关键字值无关。

span.span: Determines whether any session enabled the provider, regardless of the level and keyword values used to enable the provider.

returns.span: 如果已为某个会话启用该提供程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Is if the provider is enabled to any session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，提供程序不调用此方法以确定是否已由会话; 启用提供程序提供程序只需写入该事件，并 ETW 确定是否将事件记录到会话。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether the provider has been enabled by a session; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to the session. 一个提供程序可能想要调用此函数，如果提供程序需要执行额外的工作，以生成事件。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在这种情况下，调用此函数首先可以节省资源和时间。In this case, calling this function first may save resources and time.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled (byte level, long keywords);
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled(unsigned int8 level, int64 keywords) cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled (level As Byte, keywords As Long) As Boolean
public: bool IsEnabled(System::Byte level, long keywords);

param.name: level
param.span: 包括在该事件中的详细程度。

span.span: Level of detail included in the event.

param.name: keywords
param.span: 指定事件类别的位掩码。

span.span: Bit mask that specifies the event category.

param.span: 此掩码应当与在该事件的清单中定义的关键字掩码相同。

span.span: This mask should be the same keyword mask that is defined in the manifest for the event.

summary.span: 确认是否有任何会话正在从该提供程序请求指定的事件。

span.span: Determines whether any session is requesting the specified event from the provider.

returns.span: 如果有任何会话正在请求指定的事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Is if any session is requesting the specified event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，提供程序不调用此方法以确定是否会话请求指定的事件;提供程序只需写入该事件，并 ETW 确定是否将事件记录到会话。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether a session requested the specified event; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to a session. 一个提供程序可能想要调用此函数，如果提供程序需要执行额外的工作，以生成事件。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在这种情况下，调用此函数首先确定是否会话或不请求的事件，可以节省资源和时间。In this case, calling this function first to determine if a session requested the event or not, may save resources and time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetActivityId (ref Guid id);
.method public static hidebysig void SetActivityId(valuetype System.Guid& id) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetActivityId (ByRef id As Guid)
public: static void SetActivityId(Guid % id);

param.name: id
param.span: 由 方法返回的唯一活动标识符。

span.span: A unique activity identifier that the method returns.

summary.span: 设置由 方法使用的当前活动标识符。

span.span: Sets the current activity identifier used by the methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识符存储在线程上下文中。The identifier is stored in the thread context. 请注意，在.NET framework 版本 3.5 中，你必须设置`id`此方法的参数和属性值设置为相同的标识符值。Note that in version 3.5 of the .NET framework, you had to set the `id` parameter of this method and the property value to the same identifier value. 但是，在的 framework 版本 4.0方法会自动为您设置的相关活动标识符。However, in version 4.0 of the framework, the method automatically sets the correlation activity identifier for you. 这是静态方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 写入某个事件。

span.span: Writes an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你使用清单来定义事件，请使用这些方法。Use these methods if you use a manifest to define your events.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool WriteEvent (ref System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor eventDescriptor, params object[] eventPayload);
.method public hidebysig instance bool WriteEvent(valuetype System.Diagnostics.Eventing.EventDescriptor& eventDescriptor, object[] eventPayload) cil managed
Public Function WriteEvent (ByRef eventDescriptor As EventDescriptor, ParamArray eventPayload As Object()) As Boolean
public: bool WriteEvent(System::Diagnostics::Eventing::EventDescriptor % eventDescriptor, ... cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ eventPayload);

param.name: eventDescriptor
param.span: 用来标识要写入的事件的 实例。

span.span: An instance of that identifies the event to write.

param.name: eventPayload
param.span: 包含要写入的事件数据的对象数组。

span.span: An array of objects that contain the event data to write.

param.span: 该对象必须采用清单中所指定的顺序。

span.span: The object must be in the order specified in the manifest.

param.span: 该数组限制为 32 个对象，其中只有八个对象可以是字符串。

span.span: The array is limited to 32 objects, of which only eight may be strings.

param.span: 事件数据的最大大小限制为 64 KB 减去事件头大小所得的值。

span.span: The maximum data size for the event is limited to 64 KB minus the size of the event headers.

param.span: 如果会话的缓冲区较小，而且会话中包括事件的扩展数据项，则该事件会较小。

span.span: The event size is less if the session's buffer size is less and the session includes extended data items with the event.

param.span: 此参数可以为 null。

span.span: This parameter can be null.

span.span: Writes an event.

span.span: The event data is specified as an array of objects.

returns.span: 如果写入此事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Is if the event is written; otherwise, .

returns.span: 如果为 false，则调用 方法来确定失败的原因。

span.span: If false, call the method to determine the cause of the failure.

exception.span: 参数包含的对象或字符串太多。

span.span: The parameter contains too many objects or strings.

Console.WriteLine(EventProvider.GetLastWriteEventError()); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用的线程上下文中设置的活动 ID 来标识此组件。The method uses the activity ID set in the thread context to identify this component. 若要设置活动 ID，调用方法。To set the activity ID, call the method. 如果你使用类，你不使用方法，以指定活动 id。If you use the class, you do not use the method to specify the activity ID. 相反，访问属性来获取对象。Instead, access the property to get the object. 然后，设置属性设置为活动 id。Then, set the property to the activity ID. 你还必须设置`relatedActivityId`到值。You must also set the `relatedActivityId` to a value.

span.span: If contains too many objects or strings.
